title: Italian Red Cross President: Bombing Migrant Boats Would Be A 'Huge Mistake'
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block interviews Francesco Rocca, president of the Italian Red Cross, who is in New York lobbying against a draft U.N. proposal to destroy human smugglers' boats in Libya.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
